articles.title: Battlefield 6 Runs At 300+ FPS With Ryzen 9800X3D+RTX 5080 Combo But Reportedly Suffers Nearly 33% Loss With Intel Core i9 14900K - Wccftech
articles.description: As per early benchmarks, Battlefield 6 reportedly offers incredibly high frame rates when run on a configuration including Ryzen 9800X3D.
articles.content:
Battlefield 6 seems to be well-optimized for X3D processors. As per a Twitch streamer, Battlefield 6 was able to run at 300+ fps on average with Ryzen 7 9800X3D.
With nearly every new installment, u… [+2946 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop - Ars Technica
articles.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.
